column6: The remarkable story of Brazilian racing driver Ayrton Senna</n> charting his physical and spiritual achievements on the track and off</n> his quest for perfection</n> and the mythical status he has since attained</n> is the subject of Senna</n> a documentary feature that spans the racing legend's years as an F1 driver</n> from his opening season in 1984 to his untimely death a decade later.
Chapman is an ex-marine in Brazil's slums</n> battling the yakuza outfit who attacked his sister and left her for dead.

Based on the global blockbuster videogame franchise from Sega</n> Sonic the Hedgehog tells the story of the world’s speediest hedgehog as he embraces his new home on Earth. In this live-action adventure comedy</n> Sonic and his new best friend team up to defend the planet from the evil genius Dr. Robotnik and his plans for world domination.

Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse. Forced to confront a powerful entity</n> the Warrens find themselves caught in the most terrifying case of their lives.

column5: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It
column6: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren encounter what would become one of the most sensational cases from their files. The fight for the soul of a young boy takes them beyond anything they'd ever seen before</n> to mark the first time in U.S. history that a murder suspect would claim demonic possession as a defense.
column12: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It

column6: Set in the 22nd century</n> The Matrix tells the story of a computer hacker who joins a group of underground insurgents fighting the vast and powerful computers who now rule the earth.
